snippet.title: Arashi: Castles of Sin - Official Next-Gen VR Trailer | Upload VR Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Arashi: Castles of Sin is a VR fighting game where players will embody a deadly shinobi assassin Kenshiro going on a journey filled with betrayal and revenge. Arashi: Castles of Sin has been upgraded to take advantage of next-generation VR headsets to offer an enhanced experience from its original release. Arashi: Castles of Sin's Next-Gen VR update is launching Fall 2023.

#GameTrailers #VR #SummerofGaming
